summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4546 for the improvement of East Pacific Street from East 40th street to 11th Avenue Northeast, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53191, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
